data.name: Beaver Clicker
data.detailed_description:
Beaver Clicker is a fun, casual, and strategic Idle Game

The game gives you 1 goal, collect L O G. To help you with this endeavour, you will get help from all kinds of places, like recruiting Squirrels, and even various sorts of Fungi to help you in your wood collecting journey

Features:
  • Use logs to get even more logs
  • Collect tons of achievements!
  • Contains at least 17 beavers
  • Get your own pet beaver :)
  • Cloud saving, so you can keep the beavers you love safe <3
  • Wait there's 19 beavers now??
  • Gluten-free
  • Many unique power-ups
  • Oh, I thought i might have found the 20th beaver, but it was actually just the 7th one again
  • & Much Much More!
  • P.S if you play this, please count all the beavers for me

data.short_description: Beaver Clicker is an idle game where you collects logs, then using these logs, you can acquire all sorts of sources for these logs, like convincing squirrels, sponsoring school field-trips, or even taming the fungi found in nature itself to help you in your wood collecting journey.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: x86
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: if it can launch file explorer it's probably fine
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 2GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux Kernel 5.0+
  • Processor: x86
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: neofetch is a suitable test if you can run this
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
